entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
